title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Highly praised by critics with an 87 Metacritic score and an excellent 8.6 IMDb rating from over 26K votes, created by the renowned Vince Gilligan for Apple TV.

title: The Beast in Me
overview: A famous author is pulled into a twisted mind game with her rich, powerful new neighbor â€” who might be a murderer.
reason: This Netflix drama is well-received with a 7.5 IMDb rating from over 21K votes, led by Emmy-winning actors Claire Danes and Matthew Rhys.

title: Task
overview: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force assembled to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.
reason: Critically acclaimed with a 77 Metacritic score and an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 45K votes, featuring A-list actor Mark Ruffalo on HBO.

title: Black Rabbit
overview: A rising-star restaurateur is forced into New York's criminal underworld when his chaotic brother returns to town with loan sharks on his trail.
reason: A star-studded Netflix crime drama featuring Jason Bateman and Jude Law, earning a strong 7.4 IMDb rating from over 35K votes.
